Agoda Platform team is looking for developers to work on mission critical systems that deals with the designing and development of a system that serves millions of users a day.

8+ years’ experience under your belt developing performance-critical applications that run in a production environment using Scala and Java
A minimum of one year of experience with Scala

You have a Good command of the English language
You are passionate about the craft of software development and constantly work to improve your knowledge and skills

Knowledge in one or more of the following: NoSQL (especially, but not only Cassandra), Queueing system experience (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ), Play framework, Akka library

about_the_job:
Who We Are:
PT Kredit Biro Indonesia Jaya (Credit Bureau Indonesia, “CBI”) as one of the private credit bureaus in Indonesia has been established since 2014 and obtained an operational license from Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) as Lembaga Pengelola Informasi Perkreditan (LPIP) in 2015.

In November 2021, after obtaining approval from OJK, CBI received additional capital from shareholders and appointed a new management team, which aims to provide new and leading-edge services and products. This new identity will also strengthen CBI's position as the "best-in-class, modern and innovative" credit bureau in Indonesia.

CBI is a trailblazer in the credit bureau industry, dedicated to fostering a culture of excellence and innovation. We believe in the power of a talented and diverse team to bring cutting-edge solutions to our clients and contribute to the overall success of the financial landscape in Indonesia.

Why Join Us:
Innovative Environment: Continuously investing in cutting-edge technologies, including the powerful realm of artificial intelligence, your role becomes a pivotal part of our journey into the dynamic and evolving landscape of financial services. Being part of our innovative environment is your gateway to an exciting and forward-thinking career
Impactful Work: We offer more than just a job; we provide an opportunity to play a crucial role in shaping the financial future of individuals and businesses across the nation. As a licensed credit bureau, our commitment to accuracy, reliability, and timeliness sets the stage for impactful work
Professional Development: We are committed to the growth of our employees. Join a team that encourages continuous learning and offers opportunities for career advancement.
Collaborative Culture: Work in a collaborative and inclusive environment where your ideas are valued, and teamwork is key to achieving our goals.

Current Opportunities:
We are seeking an experienced IT Infra Engineer who will be responsible for maintaining and managing our VMware vSphere virtualization clusters, as well as the creation and management of virtual machines within the clusters. The core responsibilities of this position are to ensure the stability, security, and efficient operation of our virtualized environment.

Responsibilities:
Operate and manage VMware vSphere virtualization clusters, including configuration, monitoring, and maintenance of the clusters
Responsible for the creation, deployment, and management of virtual machines, including performance optimization, capacity planning, and troubleshooting
Ensure the security of the virtualized environment, including access control, authentication, and authorization
Monitor and optimize the utilization and performance of virtualization resources, providing performance tuning recommendations and solutions
Collaborate with the network team to ensure proper communication and collaboration between the virtualized environment and network devices
Manage and maintain shared storage devices, including configuration, capacity planning, performance optimization, and troubleshooting
Participate in the development and execution of backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and reliability
Resolve issues and problems in the virtualized environment, providing timely technical support and troubleshooting
 Requirements:
Extensive experience in VMware vSphere virtualization platform management, including configuration, monitoring, and maintenance of clusters
Familiarity with virtual machine creation, deployment, and management, with the ability to troubleshoot issues and optimize performance
Solid experience in Linux operating system maintenance, including familiarity with common commands and script writing
Knowledge of network device maintenance and configuration, as well as understanding of network protocols and common troubleshooting methods
Experience in managing and maintaining shared storage devices such as SAN and NAS, including knowledge of storage configuration, performance optimization, and troubleshooting
Strong problem-solving abilities and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to respond quickly and resolve urgent situations.
